Medical and healthcare credit card processing in Los Angeles.

Keep your cash flow going and your patients satisfied with the best credit card processing for healthcare in Los Angeles. Let us give you secure, convenient payment options for your patients.

Accept Payments Now

Credit card processing solutions that work for your practice.

Process credit cards securely online or at your clinic.

Set up automatic payments with card-on-file technology.

Reduce the number of unpaid invoices with email invoicing options.
I am item content. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

Streamline your workflow and increase successful payments.

Our healthcare merchant services and credit card processing platform is designed to help you take payments more quickly, so you can spend more time meeting the needs of your patients. With features like card-on-file technology and Apple Pay, you don’t have to waste time manually inputting patient payment information. This streamlines your check-in and check-out processes, so patients are seen more quickly, and you’re paid in a timely manner. 

Features designed to improve patient satisfaction.

Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers more than just payment processing and terminals. Our comprehensive healthcare payment processing system offers all of the tools you need to increase the number of payments you receive. All of this is handled with proper security and HIPPA compliance, so your patients and their data are kept safe. With fewer unpaid invoices, less risk, and a faster payment process, your healthcare facility will see greater success.
